# File gm_plugin/overlay.rb, line 203
      def initialize(polylines,fill=true,color="#000000",opacity=0.5,outline=false)
        #force polylines to be an array

        if polylines.is_a? Array
          @polylines = polylines
        else
          @polylines = [polylines]
        end
        @color = color
        @fill = fill 
        @opacity = opacity
        @outline = outline
      end
